name: Dr. Khadija Lahlou
description: Dr. Khadija Lahlou is an expert in marine biodiversity and fisheries management in Morocco. She has studied the ecology of Moroccan coastal zones, focusing on fish populations and their interactions with marine ecosystems. Her research helps inform the sustainable management of fishery resources, aiming to protect marine species while supporting local fishing communities. She is also involved in education and outreach to raise awareness of marine conservation issues.
